attributes.action: Britain to Become the 51st State in the U.S or to become part of the United States Commonwealth.
attributes.additional_details:
The people of the UK and the USA speak the same language and are extremely similar in beliefs and values. So why don't we make our special relationship a more permanent and meaningful fixture.

I want the Government to leave Europe and create a new and stronger alliance with the USA as a Member State or Member of the American Commonwealth
